name: FISH OFF!
description:
Game Description

FISH OFF! is a fast paced competitive game between two players, where you try to catch as many fish as humanly possible with your incredible fishing rod, before the timer expires. Try your luck and catch the crazy "Bombfish" in order to mercilessly sabotage your opponent and gain the advantage! May the best fisher win!

Team

Lukas Wolf - Project Manager / Scrum Master

Timon Stepan - Graphics / Product Owner

Samuel Sandvik - Graphics

Arvid Stensjö - Programming

Aayush Sarcar - Programming

Oskar af Bjur -  Sound Designer
